title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.54 - Seat reservations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.54 - Seat reservations

State Regulations

Licensed authorized organizations shall, pursuant to
section
4820.53
of this Part, adopt a house
rule either permitting or denying their members in charge the authority to
reserve seats for players, and shall include that house rule in its bingo
program. When seat reservations are permitted, each player shall be afforded an
equal opportunity to reserve a seat. Seats may be reserved with "Reserved Seat"
signs but, under no circumstances, shall seats be reserved by placing bingo
opportunities, daubers or other supplies on tables before unoccupied seats. Licensed authorized organizations opting not to permit seat reservations shall
adopt a house rule prohibiting seat reservations entirely. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4820.54

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
